item.description:
Welcome to the only indoor doubles opportunity in Massachusetts.

Time: 2PM - 4PM.
Cap: 6 A/AA players. Waitlist available.
Fee: $7 in advance via PayPal or by other arrangement.

Court: men's height net, long court. Floor material is MaxxPlay, a seamless polyurethane surface which exhibits excellent shock absorbent and slide characteristics.

Ruleset: http://www.meetup.com...
Format: Scrimmage/practice. Rotation is two games on, one off.
Ball: Wilson AVP

Optionally, you can also play pickup sixes noon-2PM for an additional $5 paid at entry.

Sign up as an individual. To apply, please email your doubles experience (including level BB/A/AA/O) and your email address.
Email Matt at: http://volleyball.mee...
item.name: Advanced Indoor Doubles
